name: To The Core (itch)
description:
Hello! This is my submission for the One Mechanic Jam! I was inspired by one of the mechanics from Ori and The Blind forest. Unfortunately a good majority of the time I was hoping to put into polishing the assets and adding more hazards got consumed fixing some essential bugs :(

That being said, I hope you can at least enjoy the first stage! The second stage is more for just playing around with the mechanics available.

You can use T to swap between movement modes (Swipe / Sling, basically) and you can press R to respawn! I use NVIDIA's Blast so you should have lots of fun spamming that R key.

All assets were made by me, including the code / art.

Thank you for checking it out! I put a lot of hours into it!

Update: I had to upload a second ZIP because I uploaded my save data with the first one and that would cause the story to not play.
